channel.title: Portal Question
channel.description:
Basically I want to make a special area, but I need some portals, I got the tutorial from here...So firstly check it out:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,69501.0.html
Now if I want to put more portals in which case would you put it in? Tried putting in same case and stuff, but a bit confused, can anybody explain what some of the numbers mean and how to put it? :P Ok never mind I figured it out, it has to be a case, and can't be over 3000, but can be random pretty much tested it :D thx guys! :mad: lmao :P

item.title: Portal Question
